entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
